original: @244b aom badzra a'a yu she h'um aa /
analyzed: @244b aom badzra a'a yu she h'um aa /

original: 'phags pa tshe dpag med kyi snying po 'di rtag tu bzlas sam /
analyzed: 'phags pa tshe dpag med kyi snying po 'di rtag tu bzlas sam /
translated: “Always recite this essence of the noble Amitāyus,

original: sngags chab kyis dbang bskur na tshe nur bar 'gyur ro /
analyzed: sngags chab kyis dbang bskur na tshe nur bar 'gyur ro /
translated: or if you confer empowerment with mantra water, your lifespan will be extended.”
